capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and I've been noticing that some users have been taking advantage of the system. Specifically, there's someone who goes by the name "filch" and has been misusing their power to manipulate others. I want to make it clear that I take these actions very seriously and will not tolerate any behavior like this.
I'm not a fan of the way the Filch is being portrayed as an administrator, to be honest. I think he's more of a strict enforcer of the rules rather than someone who's really in charge.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of enchantment does filch cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've always been curious about my family history, and it's interesting to know that Hagrid has a mixed wizard background. It makes sense that he would be the way he is - a bit of an outsider, but with a deep connection to magic nonetheless.
